meanings.definition: The action of associating or connecting with others.
meanings.sent1: Her interassociation with the community helped her make new friends.
meanings.sent2: The interassociation between the two companies led to a successful partnership.
meanings.sent3: The interassociation of the puzzle pieces made completing it a fun challenge.
meanings.sent4: The interassociation of colors in the painting created a harmonious composition.
meanings.sent5: His interassociation with different cultures enriched his understanding of the world.

meanings.definition: A relationship or connection between different groups or organizations.
meanings.sent1: The interassociation among the various departments improved communication.
meanings.sent2: Interassociation between schools and businesses can benefit both parties.
meanings.sent3: The interassociation of flavors in the dish made it a unique culinary experience.
meanings.sent4: The interassociation of ideas sparked innovation and creativity.
meanings.sent5: The interassociation of technology and education is shaping the future of learning.
